text: Windows NT 5.x is a family of Microsoft Windows NT, starting with Windows 2000 and ending with with Server 2003. After Windows NT 5.2's end of support in 2015, no NT 5.x operating systems are supported by Microsoft. == Versions == OS Date Build NT Version Support status Windows 2000 Windows 2000 Professional, Windows 2000 Server, Windows 2000 Advanced Server, Windows 2000 Datacenter Server NT 5.0 Mainstream support ended on June 30, 2005. Extended support ended on Windows XP Windows XP Starter Edition, Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, Windows XP Embedded, Windows XP Media Center Edition, Windows XP Tablet PC Edition, Windows 64-Bit Edition, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition NT 5.1 Mainstream support ended on April 14, 2009. Extended support ended on . Windows Server 2003 Windows Server 2003 Web Server, Windows Server 2003 Standard Server, Windows Server 2003 Datacenter Server, Windows Server 2003 Enterprise Server NT 5.2 Mainstream support ended on July 13, 2010. Extended support ended on Windows Server 2003 R2 Windows Server 2003 R2 Web Server, Windows Server 2003 R2 Standard Server, Windows Server 2003 R2 Datacenter Server, Windows Server 2003 R2 Enterprise Server. Mainstream support ended on July 13, 2010. Extended support ended on Category:Microsoft operating systems
title: Windows NT 5.x
